verses.roman:
eka-dina prabhu yameśvara-ṭoṭā yāite
sei-kāle deva-dāsī lāgilā gāite

synonyms: eka-dina—one day; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yameśvara-ṭoṭā—to the temple of Yameśvara-ṭoṭā; yāite—when He was going; sei-kāle—at that time; deva-dāsī—a female singer of the Jagannātha temple; lāgilā—began; gāite—to sing.
translation: One day when the Lord was going to the temple of Yameśvara, a female singer began to sing in the Jagannātha temple.
